text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus persii is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus which can cause onychomycosis. It is from the Circumdati section. Aspergillus persii produces xanthomegnin and ochratoxin A.
text.Growth and morphology: A. persii has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below.
